about.title: About US.
about.p1: is not a modeling or acting agency. It's an agency that responds to casting and directing offers and, via this site, offers a private talent database accessible to film professionals (directors and producers).
about.p2: agency offers a complete production and casting service throughout France.
about.p3: Naïs Graziani has directed music videos (le 3ème Oeil & Alonzo), 20 episodes of the series « Plus Belle La Vie », a series for the Palais de Tokyo, award-winning short films and is currently developing her first feature film.
about.p4: Naïs is also a casting director. Her casting credits include series such as « Caïd » (Netflix), « Narvalo » (Canal+), « Terrain Sensible » (Arte), « Validé » saison 2 (Canal+) and feature films such as « Youssef Salem a du succès », « Omar la fraise », « Houria » (figu), « Bac Nord » (figu). She has also worked on commercials for Lancôme, Tinder, Ricard, Skyn, EDF and music videos for Tiakola, Kungs and others.
about.p5: Her specialty is wild casting. The aim is to bring all types of profiles to light. Inclusion and benevolence represent the Graziani agency.
about.p6: Cinema speaks to everyone and about everyone.

contact.formEvent: Thank you for contacting us, we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

google.span1: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and Google.
